title: ITC Hotels brand 'Storii' to set up presence in West Bengal
description: ITC Hotels has signed an agreement for its first 'Storii' property in Kolkata, West Bengal, which is set to open in 2024. The hotel chain already operates three 'Storii' properties in Goa and Dharamshala. The Kolkata property will offer 30 rooms and will be a boutique resort away from the city's busy life.
